name: Shooty Game Platform Whatever
description:
Run, jump, and shoot around a map with three different paths- featuring springs, snails with rockets, faulty collision boxes, and wonky platformer physics! Woohoo!

Controls:

A/D - move left/right, Space - jump, click - shoot

Credits: 

Ryan - Producer/Team Lead/Level Designer

Dane - Programmer/Level Designer

Steve - Programmer/Level Designer
